remarks: A class of sequences of fractions that converge to 1 (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
statement:
clim1fr1.1 $e |- F = ( n e. NN |-> ( ( ( A x. n ) + B ) / ( A x. n ) ) ) $.
clim1fr1.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
clim1fr1.3 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= 0 ) $.
clim1fr1.4 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
clim1fr1 $p |- ( ph -> F ~~> 1 ) $.
$d A n $.
$d B n $.
$d n ph $.
